name: TALES OF THE SMITHS Signed Limited Edition Silkscreen Print
description:
Tales of The Smiths limited edition silkscreen printed poster, illustrated by comic book creator Con Chrisoulis.
Signed by the creator and numbered to a limited edition of only 10 copies.

This poster adorned the very first episode of Con's comic book series, Tales of The Smiths, and it was personally silkscreen printed by the creator using fluorescent pink acrylic colours.

This batch of silkscreen prints are the only ones that will be available in this colour combination.

The posters are roughly larger than A3, printed on quality 200gr paper.
The prints will remain uncut, which means that it is left to the buyer to either trim down to A3 and frame it or to keep it as is.
*Bear in mind that there are some ink blemishes outside the A3 bleed frame, which can be trimmed out or left intact at the buyer's leisure.

name: Dryland Book One///Chapter One (regular edition)
description:
The DRYLAND Book One///Chapter One first limited edition includes: 
Colour Wraparound Cover! 
28 Pages of Comics! 
Featuring the first chapter of Dryland's Book One, 
which was a finalist of Myriad Editions' UK First Fictions Graphic Novel Competition! 
The publication also includes a short Tales of The Smiths story, 
a series which will retell the pivotal, and unknown, moments 
that led to the seminal indie band's formation.

More info at: 
http://www.conchrisoulis.com/Comics/2011_and_beyond/Dryland_Book_1_Chapter_1.html
